description.overview: Communication represents how easily you express yourself, connect through words, and understand others in conversations.
description.detailed: This meter tracks Mercury and Venus transits to your natal Mercury and key communication houses (3rd = everyday talk, 7th = one-on-one dialogue). Mercury governs how you express ideas and process language. Venus adds harmony and social grace to interactions. When these planets form supportive aspects, conversations flow naturally and you feel understood. Challenging aspects create miscommunication, social awkwardness, or difficulty finding the right words. Mercury retrograde cuts communication effectiveness in half.

primary_planets.mercury: Rules language, expression, and information exchange
primary_planets.venus: Social grace, harmony in communication, diplomatic expression

secondary_planets.mars: Adds directness and assertiveness but can create bluntness
secondary_planets.saturn: Can create communication blocks but adds gravitas when positive

key_houses.3: Everyday communication, siblings, neighbors, short exchanges

aspect_weights.conjunction: Maximum communication impact - intense connection or confusion
aspect_weights.opposition: High impact - tension in understanding each other
aspect_weights.trine: High flow - words come easily and are well-received

interpretation_guidelines.tone: Social and relational - talk about conversations, texts, meetings, social interactions
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_high: Emphasize important conversations, networking, expressing needs, difficult talks you've been avoiding
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_low: Emphasize listening more than talking, written communication over verbal, waiting for better timing
interpretation_guidelines.focus_when_challenging: Acknowledge miscommunication risks but offer strategies (clarify before reacting, ask questions, give benefit of doubt)

phrasing_examples.high_harmonious: Communication flows beautifully today - this is your window for important conversations, expressing what you need, or having talks you've been putting off.
phrasing_examples.moderate_mixed: Conversations take more effort today - ask clarifying questions and give people the benefit of the doubt before assuming meaning.
phrasing_examples.low_challenging: Words aren't coming easily today - text instead of calling when possible, and save vulnerable conversations for when communication feels less fraught.
